short_description: A quick and easy Italian pasta dish made with garlic and olive oil.
ingredients: Spaghetti: long, thin pasta typically made from durum wheat semolina.
Garlic: minced for a fragrant and savory flavor.
Olive oil: extra virgin for a rich and fruity taste.
Red pepper flakes: adds a spicy kick to the dish.
Parsley: fresh and chopped for garnish.
Salt: enhances the overall flavor of the dish.
Black pepper: freshly ground for a hint of heat.
Parmesan cheese: grated, for a salty and nutty finish.

short_description: A creamy and flavorful chicken dish, perfect with rice or naan.
ingredients: Chicken breast: boneless and cut into bite-sized pieces for marinating.
Yogurt: used for marinating the chicken to keep it tender.
Tomato sauce: forms the base of the rich and creamy sauce.
Onion: finely chopped for sweetness and depth of flavor.
Garlic: minced to add aromatic essence.
Ginger: grated for a hint of spice and warmth.
Spices: a blend including cumin, coriander, and garam masala for authenticity.
Cilantro: fresh leaves for garnish, adding a pop of color and flavor.

short_description: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried to perfection.
ingredients: Bell peppers: sliced in various colors for visual appeal.
Broccoli: florets that add crunch and nutrition.
Carrots: julienned for sweetness and color.
Snow peas: crisp and slightly sweet for texture.
Soy sauce: for a savory umami flavor in the dish.
Garlic: minced to enhance the aroma and taste.
Ginger: grated to provide a warm, spicy undertone.
Sesame oil: drizzled at the end for a nutty finish.

short_description: Classic cookies with gooey chocolate chips, perfect for any occasion.
ingredients: Flour: all-purpose for structure and texture.
Sugar: granulated sugar for sweetness and crispness.
Brown sugar: packed for a moist, chewy cookie.
Butter: softened for creaminess and flavor.
Eggs: large eggs to bind the ingredients together.
Vanilla extract: pure for a rich, sweet aroma.
Baking soda: leavening agent for a light and fluffy cookie.
Chocolate chips: semi-sweet for melting and sweetness.

short_description: A fresh and crisp salad with a creamy dressing.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce: chopped for a crisp base.
Croutons: crunchy bites made from toasted bread.
Parmesan cheese: shaved for a salty, nutty flavor.
Caesar dressing: creamy dressing with anchovies for depth.
Anchovies: finely chopped for a savory punch.
Garlic: minced for aromatic richness in the dressing.
Lemon juice: fresh squeezed for acidity and brightness.
Black pepper: freshly ground for seasoning.
